page.title: 02ATTITUDES Pentney & Narboro'
page.content: During the period of the survey the opinions of people, with regard to current topics, were monitored in a Narborough shop and the main themes resulting were:- { Weather}and in particular the wet cool summer resulting in a troublesome harvest and other delays. { Cost of living}with reference to heating bills and the cost of repairs. { Complaints}were voiced about too many callers after dark, as it worried the elderly. { Strikes,}e.g. those of the miners and the teachers were regarded as harmful. { Crime}and the lack of sufficient punishment for it worried many. { Concern}was expressed at the lack of public conveniences as residents were often asked for them by visitors.
